Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Canteen

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Canteen
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
public class Canteen extends Object implements Movable
the class canteen represent a part of the player dashboard, inside the canteen can be stored students, and can give coins to the players depending by the number of students in it

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Student s)
      Method to add a student in the canteen. The method automatically insert the new student in an ArrayList according to its color
      Specified by:
      addStudent in interface Movable
      Parameters:
      s - is the student you want to add in the canteen

    • getStudents

      public ArrayList<Student> getStudents(Color c)
      This method returns all the students of color C currently in the Canteen
      Parameters:
      c - is the color of the students you want
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of students of that color

    • getNumberStudentColor

      public int getNumberStudentColor(Color c)
      This method, given a Color c, returns the number of students in the Canteen of Color c
      Parameters:
      c - is the color of the students you want
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of students of Color c in the canteen

    • removeStudent

      public Student removeStudent(int id) throws IllegalMoveException
      Method to remove a student from the Canteen (needed only when certain characters are activated
      Specified by:
      removeStudent in interface Movable
      Parameters:
      id - the identification number corresponding to the student you want to remove
      Returns:
      the Student with the corresponding id (if it is in the Canteen)
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if there is no such Student in this Canteen

    • canGetCoin

      public boolean canGetCoin(Color c, boolean reset)
      Method to check if a player is eligible to get a coin. after a move
      Parameters:
      c - is the Color of the last Student moved to the Canteen
      reset - is a flag that set to false the giveCoin boolean. When we exchange 2 students this flag can't be reset for the first color because we don't know if the first Movable in the moveStudents method was the Canteen or the Entrance.
      Returns:
      true if the player is eligible to get a coin, false otherwise
